Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.abstract: The URL for the underlying media file. Returns nil if the url was omitted from the response (i.e. select operation in query)

Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.name: urlString
Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.abstract: String representation for the URL of the media file associated with this asset. Optional for compatibility with select operator queries.

Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.name: title
Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.abstract: The title of the asset. Optional for compatibility with select operator queries.

Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.name: description
Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.abstract: Description of the asset. Optional for compatibility with select operator queries.

Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.name: file
Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.abstract: Metadata describing the file associated with the asset. Optional for compatibility with select operator queries.

Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.name: QueryType
Classes/Asset.html#/s:10Contentful5Asset.abstract: The QueryType for an Asset is AssetQuery

Classes/Asset.html.name: Asset
Classes/Asset.html.abstract: An asset represents a media file in Contentful.

Classes/Client.html.name: Client
Classes/Client.html.abstract: Client object for performing requests against the Contentful API.

Classes/ContentType.html.name: ContentType
Classes/ContentType.html.abstract: A Content Type represents your data model for Entries in a Contentful Space

Classes/Entry.html.name: Entry
Classes/Entry.html.abstract: An Entry represents a typed collection of data in Contentful

Classes/APIError.html.name: APIError
Classes/APIError.html.abstract: Information regarding an error received from Contentful’s API.

Classes/RateLimitError.html.name: RateLimitError
Classes/RateLimitError.html.abstract: For requests that do hit the Contentful Delivery API enforces rate limits of 78 requests per second

Classes/Locale.html.name: Locale
Classes/Locale.html.abstract: A Locale represents possible translations for Entry Fields

Classes/LocalizationContext.html.name: LocalizationContext
Classes/LocalizationContext.html.abstract: The LocalizationContext contains meta information about a Space about locales including

Classes/Ordering.html.name: Ordering
Classes/Ordering.html.abstract: A small class to create parameters used for ordering the responses when querying an endpoint

Classes/Ordered.html.name: Ordered
Classes/Ordered.html.abstract: A small class to create parameters used for ordering the responses when querying an endpoint

Classes/Location.html.name: Location
Classes/Location.html.abstract: Small struct to store location coordinates. This is used in preferences over CoreLocation types to avoid

Classes/ResourceQuery.html.name: ResourceQuery
Classes/ResourceQuery.html.abstract: A concrete implementation of AbstractResourceQuery which serves as the base class for both EntryQuery and AssetQuery.

Classes/Query.html.name: Query
Classes/Query.html.abstract: A concrete implementation of ChainableQuery which can be used to make queries on /entries/

Classes/Space.html.name: Space
Classes/Space.html.abstract: A Space represents a collection of Content Types, Assets and Entries in Contentful

Classes/SyncSpace.html.name: SyncSpace
Classes/SyncSpace.html.abstract: A container for the synchronized state of a Space

Classes/LinkQuery.html.name: LinkQuery
Classes/LinkQuery.html.abstract: An additional query to filter by the properties of linked objects when searching on references.

Classes/QueryOn.html.name: QueryOn
Classes/QueryOn.html.abstract: A concrete implementation of EntryQuery which requires that a model class conforming to EntryType

Classes/AssetQuery.html.name: AssetQuery
Classes/AssetQuery.html.abstract: Queries on Asset types. All methods from ChainableQuery are available, are inherited and available.

Classes/ContentTypeQuery.html.name: ContentTypeQuery
Classes/ContentTypeQuery.html.abstract: Queries on content types. All methods from ChainableQuery are available, are inherited and available.

Typealiases.html.abstract: The following type aliases are available globally.
